choices: You ask her if you and your sister can stay with you bedridden gradma
1.content: You wake up after getting a good nights rest. You get up from your bed. You hear the sizzling of bacon. And eggs. You see your mom alone in the kitchen. You ask her where the rest of the family are. She just points to her cleavage. Your not token back by this because your mother always does this during breakfast or when you all go shopping or go on vacation. She then leans down to let you inside her cleavage too. You then climb inside her cleavage as you disappear in-between her very big breasts. After breakfast she tells you all that she is going on a business trip for the weekend and that all of you are coming with her in her cleavage. How do you react to this?
1.title: A new day

info.description: Everyone in your family has a special power where they are able to store stuff inside their bodies without making a bulge on their bodies everyone in your family has this power except for you.
